listitem.simpara: The hyphen (-) character can be used in hostnames of schools (Bug 37770).

During Installation of UCS@school on a UCS DC Slave, the &ucsUCRV; connector/ldap/binddn is now set explicitly to the value of ldap/hostdn. This avoids problems in cases where Samba/AD serivces had been installed on the Slave before installing UCS@school (Bug 37820).
The error handling in various modules has been improved. Errors could happen in case of missing user or network objects due to manual deletion or selective replication (Bug 37764), (Bug 37769).

To prevent problems with usernames that are too long for windows, the CSV import module restricts the length of usernames (with default settings the limit is 15 characters). Overlong usernames will be highlighted with a red cell background (Bug 36450).

Whitespace characters in the birthday column of CSV files could lead to error messages or highlighted red cells during the CSV import. The CSV import module now removes whitespace characters automatically from birthday column's values. (Bug 37027, Bug 37777).
Improoved error handling in case the module process dies between uploading and importing of CSV files (Bug 37762).

Invalid characters in automatically generated usernames are now stripped. For new installations of UCS@school the automatically generated usernames will consists of the first five characters of the firstname and the lastname each separated by a dot. Systems which are upgraded keep the old behavior. The new behavior can be enabled by setting the UCR variable ucsschool/csvimport/username/generation/firstname_lastname to false (Bug 37821).

To prevent problems with usernames that are too long for windows, the UMC module Users (schools) restricts the length of usernames (with default settings the limit is 15 characters). This limitation may be disabled by setting the UCR variable ucsschool/ldap/check/username/lengthlimit to false (Bug 36450).
DNS timeouts will not prevent opening the UCS@school configuration module anymore (Bug 32050).
A memory leak in the computerroom module has been fixed (Bug 36469).
A segmentation fault in the libqjpeg library is now prevented when receiving screenshot information (Bug 37768).
Uploading files with umlauts in their name has been fixed (Bug 37823).
Various text changes have been done (Bug 37767, Bug 37766).
Uploading files with umlauts in their name has been fixed (Bug 37823).
A memory leak in iTALC has been fixed (Bug 36469).
